def_cn: （军事装备或运载工具）远程的
def_en: A long-range piece of military equipment or vehicle is able to hit or detect a target a long way away or to travel a long way in order to do something.

def_cn: （计划、预测）长远的，长期的
def_en: A long-range plan or prediction relates to a period extending a long time into the future.
